{"blocks":[{"key":"cu7fc","text":"Homogenize with Miltenyi tissue dissociation protocol: \"Protein_01_01\" on the gentleMACS instrument in the chiller/cold room.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"70sn6","text":"Briefly centrifuge the gentleMACS M tube to pull all the homogenate to the bottom.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2cfuo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"160","duration":15,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C25DDE70DAF011EBBC9F87A13F86295D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5iug","text":"Wash gentleMACS M tube with another 1 mL of MACS buffer and filter the wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"306p0","text":"Resuspend the pellet with the recommended NPB buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fr5l","text":"QA/QC: Count the nuclei. Mix 1:1 volume of cellular suspension with a staining solution (ie DAPI). Load 10 uL of mixture onto a Biorad Cell Counter slide then count with a BioRad TC20 Cell Counter. Gate 4 uM-6 uM for nuclei sizes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fpq0m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

Nuclei should appear distinct, have rounded borders and the majority occurring as singlets.
